1.title: Barking Bad/Smarty Pants
1.plot: Join Dudley Puppy, aka Tuff Puppy, and Kitty Katswell, partners in the secret crime-fighting organization T.U.F.F. - Turbo Undercover Fighting Force - as they protect their hometown of Petropolis - and the world - from evil

2.title: Great Scott/To Bee or Not to Bee
2.plot: Join Dudley Puppy, aka Tuff Puppy, and Kitty Katswell, partners in the secret crime-fighting organization T.U.F.F. - Turbo Undercover Fighting Force - as they protect their hometown of Petropolis - and the world - from evil

3.title: While the Cat's Away/Sweet Revenge
3.plot: Join Dudley Puppy, aka Tuff Puppy, and Kitty Katswell, partners in the secret crime-fighting organization T.U.F.F. - Turbo Undercover Fighting Force - as they protect their hometown of Petropolis - and the world - from evil

4.title: Hide and Ghost Seek/Cod Squad
4.plot: TUFF is hired by Mayor Teddy Bear to get rid of a ghost in an old haunted mansion. When the Caped Cod puts a giant robotic shark in the lake, Dudley must stop him and rescue all the fishermen.

5.title: TUFF Love/Soar Loser
5.plot: Keswick seeks the help of Dudley to woo his dream girl, Tammy. TUFF comes to the rescue when Birdbrain threatens to destroy the Owl Force Academy for rejecting his application.

8.title: T.U.F.F. Break Up
8.plot: When the citizens of Petropolis no longer appreciate TUFF, Dudley and Kitty quit and find new jobs. But when the Chief is kidnapped by the city's new super villain, the Overbear, the TUFF team must reunite to save the day.

1.title: Purr-Fect Partners/Doom-Mates
1.plot: Purr-fect Partners: Dudley Puppy is introduced to the Turbo Undercover Fighting Force and his reluctant new partner, Kitty Katswell. They team up to stop Snaptrap from enslaving all the rats in Petropolis! Together they make on heck of a crime-fighting duo. Doom-mates: When Kitty's life is in danger it's up to Dudley to protect her from the Chameleon. But Kitty needs someone to protect her from Dudley's unique brand of "protection"!

2.title: Mall Rat/Operation: Happy Birthday
2.plot: Mall Rat: Everyone but Kitty believes that Snaptrap has had a change of heart in prison. But when Snaptrap finally reveals his true colors by launching the crowded Petropolis Mall into the sun, it's up to Kitty to save the day! Operation: Happy Birthday: Dudley is determined to give Kitty the best birthday of her life, despite the fact that they will have to stop Snaptrap, who is plotting to rid the world of cheese with a giant cheese magnet!

3.title: Snapnapped/Mom-A-Geddon
3.plot: Snapnapped: Under appreciated at T.U.F.F., gadget guru Keswick is courted by Snaptrap to build D.O.O.M. a new doomsday device! Will Keswick turn to the dark side or will he stay loyal to T.U.F.F.? Mom-A-Geddon: Dudley is desperate to keep his over-protective mom, Peg Puppy, from learning he's a secret agent. But when the evil Bird Brain captures Peg, Dudley must save her and in the process reveal what he really does.

4.title: Cruisin' for a Bruisin'/Puppy Love
4.plot: Cruisin' For a Bruisin': To distract Dudley from bothering her on T.U.F.F.'s vacation cruise, Kitty lies and tells him they're on a stake-out and that he should be on the lookout for bad guys. Little does she know, Snaptrap and his iceberg of D.O.O.M. are actually headed right for their cruise ship! Puppy Love: Dudley falls head over heels for "Fifi Oui Oui", the new temp at T.U.F.F. Kitty and Keswick help him woo her before realizing it's the Chameleon in disguise, bent on destroying T.U.F.F. from the inside!

5.title: Toast of T.U.F.F./Share-a-Lair
5.plot: Toast of T.U.F.F.: Things get a little scary when Keswick invents an artificial intelligence toaster that is capable of doing a lot more than making perfect toast. When the toaster goes berserk, it's up to Dudley and Kitty to save Petropolis. Share-a-Lair: After blowing up each other's HQ's repeatedly, T.U.F.F. and D.O.O.M. are forced to share an office. Right before they destroy each other, they discover that it is the Chameleon who has turned them against each other.

6.title: Dog Daze/Internal Affairs
6.plot: Dog Daze: Snaptrap is convinced there's no winning as long as Dudley works for T.U.F.F. He devises an evil plan to hypnotize Dudley and make him act so crazy that the Chief will have to fire him. Internal Affairs: The Chief is feeling past his prime until an accidentally shrunken Dudley convinces him to be his partner on one last "tiny" mission. Dudley questions his judgment when both he and the Chief are swallowed by Chameleon!

7.title: Chilly Dog/The Doomies
7.plot: Chilly Dog: Someone is kidnapping the world's greatest figure skaters! It's up to Dudley and Kitty to go undercover as ice skaters to bring the kidnappers to justice. The Doomies: Kitty and Dudley (disguised as super villains) attend the "Doomie Awards", an awards show in which bad guys commit live acts of villainy. It's up to our heroes to foil each crime before their identities are discovered.

8.title: Thunder Dog/Snap Dad
8.plot: Thunder Dog: Kitty helps Dudley conquer his fear of thunder in order to stop Bird Brain from using his thunder cannon to bury Petropolis in an avalanche. Snap Dad: To Dudley's horror, Snaptrap and his mom, Peg, have fallen in love! Things couldn't get any worse, or so Dudley thinks, until Snaptrap is inspired by his new girlfriend to turn a new leaf and becomes the newest member of T.U.F.F.

9.title: Iron Mutt/The Wrong Stuff
9.plot: Iron Mutt: Keswick creates a super suit that makes Dudley the biggest hero in Petropolis! Dudley's fame goes to his head and it's up to Kitty to bring him to his senses and save Petropolis. The Wrong Stuff: Kitty's old partner, Jack Rabbit, tries to recruit Kitty to work for him at his new secret agency. Dudley doesn't trust Jack and saves Kitty from his evil clutches in the nick of time.

10.title: Dog Dish/Watch Dog
10.plot: Dog Dish: Dudley is humiliated when he's forced to wear a cone to keep him from scratching. He finally stops feeling sorry for himself and learns to use the cone to his advantage to save Kitty from a horde of dangerous villains! Watch Dog: Dudley uses a time travel watch to go back in time one minute in order to beat Kitty to the last donut in the T.U.F.F. snack room. Dudley accidentally alters the course of time and creates a world in which Snaptrap is in charge and everyone at T.U.F.F. works for him.

11.title: Forget Me Mutt/Mind Trap
11.plot: Forget Me Mutt: Dudley is the only T.U.F.F. agent who has overhead Snaptrap's latest diabolical plan. But when he develops a form of amnesia in which he thinks he's the Chief, Kitty, Keswick and finally Snaptrap, it's up to Kitty to thwart D.O.O.M. Mind Trap: While wearing a mind reading helmet, Kitty, Dudley and Keswick are insulted by the Chief's secret opinion of them. Snaptrap steals the helmet, goes on a crime spree and kidnaps the chief. Will the gang put their hurt feelings aside to rescue him?

12.title: Kid Stuff/Super Duper Crime Busters
12.plot: Kid Stuff: Snaptrap discovers a T.U.F.F. rule that states agents can't use their blasters in the presence of kids, so he brings children to the scene of all of his crimes. By disguising Keswick as a beloved children's TV star, Dudley and Kitty lure the kids away and foil Snaptrap. Super Duper Crime Busters: A documentary-style TV show spends a day profiling T.U.F.F. and its superstar agents. Much to the agents' embarrassment, it happens to be the most boring day at T.U.F.F. ever!

13.title: Mission: Really Big Mission
13.plot: Mission: Really Big Mission (half-hour special): Snaptrap wants to use T.U.F.F.'s super space laser to pop all the corn in the world's "corn belt" and jack up the price of movie popcorn. When Dudley accidentally breaks the laser into three pieces, the race is on to get them back! Who will get them first and control the world's most deadly laser ever?

14.title: Frisky Business/Hot Dog
14.plot: Frisky Business: Peg Puppy goes out of town for a few days, leaving Dudley on his own for the first time in his whole life! Dudley can't wait - he'll get to do all the things he's normally not allowed to do! After all, how much trouble can one puppy get into? Hot Dog: Dudley's entered the Petropolis Dog Show, but when his finely coiffed fur interferes with his ability to be a T.U.F.F. Agent and gets Kitty in trouble with the Chameleon, he'll have to make an epic choice: save Kitty or win the coveted pageant prize - his own personal mailman!

15.title: Disobedience School/The Dog Who Cried Fish
15.plot: Disobedience School: Snaptrap has formed a school for evil and it's up to Dudley to go undercover as an evil student and figure out Snaptrap's end game! Can Dudley stop Snaptrap before Snaptrap figures out that he works for T.U.F.F.? The Dog Who Cried Fish: Dudley's turn to pick the office lunch goes horribly awry when he tries to serve up the crazy homicidal Caped Cod, determined to rule the "Above Water" world. Oh and not to mention, destroy Dudley!

16.title: Doom and Gloom/Law and Odor
16.plot: Doom and Gloom: Larry has finally snapped under Snaptrap's ruthless authority and forms his own evil agency, dubbed "G.L.O.O.M."! Much to Dudley and Kitty's chagrin, it turns out Larry is pretty good at being bad! Law and Odor: Petropolis' worst smelling villain, the Stink Bug, has returned to make life odorous for T.U.F.F. Keswick has a cold and Dudley's super sensitive snout is rendering him helpless. T.U.F.F. needs a plan and fast, before Stink Bug turns Petropolis into a cesspool of stench!

17.title: The Rat Pack/Booby Trap
17.plot: The Rat Pack: When Keswick's cloning machine ends up in the wrong hands, Petropolis is overrun by Snaptraps looting and destroying everything in their path! Things look pretty desperate for T.U.F.F. when Snaptrap sends his clone army to destroy them, but Dudley has a few tricks up his sleeve, including a few extra Dudleys! Booby Trap: Bird Brain's discovery that he is the last blue-bottomed booby in Petropolis lands him on the endangered species list and, unfortunately, off T.U.F.F.'s "Most Wanted" list as they are not allowed to touch him with his newly acquired ...

18.title: The Curse of King Mutt/Bored of Education
18.plot: The Curse of King Mutt: Protecting the King Mutt exhibit at the Natural History Museum from all the fiends who want to steal King Mutt's jewel encrusted bone scepter proves to be a lot more challenging than Dudley and Kitty expected. Especially because Dudley can't fight his uncontrollable urge to bury it! Bored of Education: Playing it safe at Career Day turns out to be the most dangerous thing Kitty and Dudley ever do! When the Chameleon entices an entire class of first graders into a life of crime, Dudley and Kitty must convince them that even though being a good ...

19.title: Snappy Campers/Lucky Duck
19.plot: Snappy Campers: Determined to avenge his youth, Snaptrap has returned to Camp Itchyowiebooboo to win the coveted "Camp Champ" award by any means necessary! Dudley and Kitty go undercover as campers, but foiling Snaptrap may just push him to do something even more diabolical! Lucky Duck: Dudley is psyched when he gets chosen to be in a scavenger hunt on his favorite TV show, "Quacky the Duck". But when the hunt gets a bit strange and Kitty questions Quacky's motivations, Dudley must choose between his hero and trusting his partner!

20.title: Guard Dog/Dog Save the Queen
20.plot: Guard Dog: When the Chameleon witnesses Snaptrap committing a crime in a neighboring town, he agrees to testify against him. It's up to Dudley to keep the Chameleon safe from Snaptrap on the long train ride to Petsburgh! But who will keep Dudley safe from the Chameleon's weird habits? Dog Save the Queen: When the Chameleon threatens to relieve the Queen of England of her Crown Jewels, Dudley and Kitty are called in to assist B.U.F.F. - the British Undercover Fighting Force. But rooting out the Chameleon in a strange land proves to be quite challenging, especially with...

21.title: A Doomed Christmas
21.plot: A Doomed Christmas (half-hour Christmas special): After years of being on Santa's naughty list, Petropolis' villains team up to hi-jack Christmas. Dudley and Kitty have to stop them and save Santa and his elves before midnight or nobody will get presents this year, including Dudley, who desperately wants a race car bed.

22.title: Big Dog on Campus/Dog's Best Friend
22.plot: Big Dog on Campus: Dudley is thrilled to show his old classmates that he grew up to be a super cool T.U.F.F. secret agent, not a loser like they thought he would become. But when a mysterious villain threatens to annihilate everyone at his reunion, Dudley must go undercover as the loser they thought he would be in order to root out the villain! Dog's Best Friend: Dudley befriends a Killer Robot sent by Snaptrap to annihilate T.U.F.F.

23.title: Dudley Do-Wrong/Puppy Unplugged
23.plot: Dudley Do-Wrong: The Chameleon impersonates Mayor Teddy Bear and closes down T.U.F.F., turning all of Petropolis against our heroes. Dudley and the gang at T.U.F.F. keep working together to defeat the Chameleon and save the real mayor. Puppy Unplugged: Bird Brain plunges the world into a technology-less void. It's up to Kitty, Dudley and some alien technology to get Petropolis back up and online!

24.title: Top Dog/Quack in the Box
24.plot: Top Dog: While Dudley overzealously takes over for a sick Chief, the Fiendish League of Potential Perpetrators, or F.L.O.P.P. for short, attempts to make their crime debut! Quack in the Box: Quacky and the Sharing Moose are back to get revenge on Dudley for putting them in jail. They open a fast food chain and try to frame Dudley for taking out the competition!

25.title: Monkey Business/Diary of a Mad Cat
25.plot: Monkey Business: When Bird Brain attempts to kidnap the latest boy band sensation, the Hunky Monkeys, it's up to the gang at T.U.F.F. to keep them safe. The only problem is Dudley can't stand them! Diary of a Mad Cat: In an attempt to learn more about Kitty, Dudley accidentally sends her diary out in a mass email to everyone in Petropolis. Now that all the villains know Kitty's weaknesses, they easily defeat her. Dudley has to convince Kitty that she's super awesome no matter who knows what about her!

26.title: Lie Like a Dog/Cold Fish
26.plot: Lie Like a Dog: While playing hooky from work, Dudley does some pretty heroic things but can't take credit for them without admitting he's been lying! Cold Fish: The deranged Caped Cod has escaped and vows to destroy Petropolis by melting a giant Ice Bird Iceberg for the Riceberg Wedding and flooding the city! Dudley's not sure who the real enemy is - the Caped Cod or the pants Dudley has to wear to stay warm enough to defeat him!

1.title: Pup Daddy/Candy Cane-ine
1.plot: Pup Daddy: When Dudley accidentally hits the other T.U.F.F. agents with a Young Gun, they turn into younger versions of themselves. However, they will continue to age backwards unless Dudley can get the Young Gun back from Snaptrap. Candy Cane-ine: Willy Wombat, the world's greatest candy maker, asks if T.U.F.F.'s best agents can break in to his factory to test his new security system. Naturally, Dudley volunteers himself and Kitty.

2.title: Freaky Spy Day/Dog Tired
2.plot: Dudley overhears a voicemail message from Kitty's old partner, asking her to meet up. Dudley thinks he's up to no good.When Snaptrap gets his hands on a Dream Destroyer, he plans on using it to make Dudley's dreams so good he never wants to wake up.

3.title: Dog House/Time Waits for No Mutt
3.plot: 1. Dudley get his own place when he rents out a tree house, and he then takes in a roommate, little knowing that it is Snaptrap in disguise. 2. After constantly being late for work, Dudley is warned that he will be fired if it ever happens again, and Petropolis' villains are determined to see that it does.

4.title: Love Bird/Bluff Puppy
4.plot: Birdbrain invents a Lovey Dovey Kissy Smoochy gun, a device that will make anyone he blasts fall deeply in love with him, starting with Dudley.

5.title: Bark to the Future/Lights Camera Quacktion
5.plot: Keswick is working on an invention that will allow the TUFF agents to see the Chameleon no matter what. In an effort to get his hands on the invention, the Chameleon turns into Dudley and convinces him that he's future Dudley.

6.title: Close Encounters of the Doomed Kind/Golden Retriever
6.plot: When Dudley and Keswick manage to make contact with alien life forms, Snaptrap commandeers the alien ship and uses its hi tech weapons to wreak havoc on Petropolis.

7.title: Rat Trap/Agent of the Year
7.plot: Dudley and Kitty take pity on Snaptrap, who is ridiculed by his family and wants to impress them with a staged arrest at the Snaptrap family reunion. Dudley and Kitty find out they've made the same number of arrests and are tied for the Agent of the Year award, so they both go on an arresting-spree in an effort to win the coveted trophy.

8.title: TUFF Choices/Sob Story
8.plot: Snaptrap realizes his inability to make a decision stands in his way when it comes to getting away with crimes, so he buys an Indecision Ray and uses it on TUFF.

9.title: Hush Puppy/Quacky Birthday
9.plot: Dudley's loud voice is always getting TUFF into trouble, so Keswick invents a Holler Collar to put Dudley's voice on mute.

10.title: Happy Howl-O-Ween
10.plot: It's Halloween and the towns villains take all of Petropolis's candy. Meanwhile Keswick brings a candy craving horde of zombies to life.

11.title: 'Til Doom Do Us Part
11.plot: DOOM teams up with the Chameleon to steal wedding presents, causing all the couples to cancel their weddings. The only way to catch the bad guys is for Dudley and Kitty to fake being in love and stage a wedding.

12.title: Barking Tall/Bad Eggs
12.plot: Birdbrain steals TUFF's latest invention: the Grow Faster Blaster and becomes a giant.Dudley and Kitty go undercover at the hospital to find out who is stealing all the eggs.

13.title: Mutts and Bolts/Bark to Nature
13.plot: Dudley is struck by lightning and discovers that he can see the future. He uses his new ability to catch criminals.The agents go camping at Yellowbone Park, where Snaptrap happens to be stealing picnic baskets.

14.title: Carbon Copies/T.U.F.F. Cookies
14.plot: Dudley leaves the door open to the simulation station and his imaginations become real and escape.Dudley is picked to be the new "spokesdog" for Quacky's new line of cookies, "Animal Quackers".

15.title: Subliminal Criminal/Acting T.U.F.F.
15.plot: Dudley takes Crime-etapp, a medicine scientifically designed to help understand the criminal mind.Dudley's Movie Star hero, Woodchuck Norris, comes to TUFF to do research for his next big, blockbuster spy movie.

16.title: T.U.F.F. Sell/Tattle Tale
16.plot: Snaptrap wins the lottery, and buys TUFF in an evil plan to fire all the agents. FLOPP is tired of Dudley getting in the way of their evil plans so they decide to tattle on Dudley and get him sent to detention.

17.title: A Tale of Two Kitties/Pup in the Air
17.plot: Kitty's evil twin sister, Katty Katswell, breaks out of prison and swaps places with Kitty at TUFF!/ Birdbrain uses an anti-gravity device to fly. However, he cranks the device up so high that soon all of Petropolis is floating

18.title: True Spies/Bagel and the Beast
18.plot: Kitty and Dudley accidentally drink Keswick's truth syrup and can't stop telling the truth! Petropolis is convinced that Bigfoot is a burglar, so Dudley sets out to clear his childhood hero's name.

19.title: Mud with Power/Legal Beagle
19.plot: After realizing that he's not in charge of anything, Dudley orders a packet of Mudbuglets to take care of.TUFF discovers a book of laws written by Daniel Boone Looney and must obey them no matter how crazy the laws are.

20.title: The Spelling Bee/House Broken
20.plot: The Chameleon disguises himself as the Easter Bunny and goes on a crime spree in Petropolis. Birdbrain finds a rare flower that makes him indestructible. Dudley and Kitty go to the rainforest to stop him.

22.title: Dancin' Machine/The Good, the Bad and the Quacky
22.plot: Dudley teams up with the Chameleon for Petropolis' dancing competition. Quacky and the Sharing Moose stage a fake reality show and invite TUFF to compete against DOOM, live on the show.

23.title: Sheep Dog/Mom's Away
23.plot: Dudley goes undercover as a lady sheep to catch the Chameleon who's been "fleecing" sheep out of their money.TUFF gets intel that Snaptrap has taken all the moms! Dudley must rescue them before they're shipped away!

25.title: Match Me If You Can/Organized Crime
25.plot: FLOPP kidnaps the most valuable TUFF agent: the secretary, Tammy. Dudley must rescue her before TUFF falls apart! When an efficiency test shows that Dudley and Kitty aren't well suited partners, thery are reassigned.

26.title: Girlfriend or Foe/Scared Wit-less
26.plot: Kitty's evil twin sister, Katty Katswell, breaks out of prison and swaps places with Kitty at TUFF!/ Birdbrain uses an anti-gravity device to fly. However, he cranks the device up so high that soon all of Petropolis is floating

-1.title: Stressed to Kill/Puff Puppy
-1.plot: Dudley, Kitty, Birdbrain and Snaptrap become indestructible after they enter another dimension. It's Boss Appreciation Day and Dudley is determined to make the Chief's day great by taking him to a spa.

imdb.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy
plot: A secret agent labradoodle is recruited into a task force called T.U.F.F and fights injustice throughout the city in which he lives.
